        public void save(java.io.File file,
        Project project)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the specified project to the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to save the model to
        project - the project to save
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error duing saving

      • load

        public void load(java.io.File file,
        Project project,
        DataManager manager,
        FormulaElementCreator creator)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the project data in specified file into the specified project.
        Parameters:
        file - the file containing the data to load
        project - the project to load the data into
        manager - used to create the Datasets
        creator - the creator used to properly create the formula items
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error during loading.
